department: Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada (ISED)
description: Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada (ISED) requires the services of a Contractor to evaluate the regulatory, policy, guidelines and compliance measures for telecommunications reliability from all-hazards implemented or under consideration in other similar jurisdictions to make recommendations that are suitable for the Canadian telecommunications environment.
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Telecommunications Resilience Regulatory Analysis

The Canadian government has issued a request for proposal (RFP) for a comprehensive analysis of telecommunications reliability from all-hazards implemented or under consideration in other jurisdictions. The aim of this project is to evaluate regulatory, policy, guidelines, and compliance measures and provide recommendations suitable for the Canadian telecommunications environment.

#### Project Details

- **Reference Number**: PW-22-01014010
- **Solicitation Number**: ISED205192
- **Publication Date**: November 18, 2022
- **Closing Date**: December 5, 2022, at 14:00:00
- **Verification Documents**: *_[ISED205192 - NPP.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/18/8eee0f4d90bdac22688e9273cb1f0f51/ised205192_-_npp.pdf)*_, *_[ISED205192 - Attachment 2 to Part 1 - List of Suppliers](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/18/8d4f48c962e328ef01d783dab153598e/ised205192_-_attachment_2_to_part_1_-_list_of_suppliers.docx)_*

#### Eligibility and Conflict-of-Interest Exceptions

This project is open to bids from companies in the Human Resource Services and Business Consulting/Change Management sectors, with specific services including Project Management Services, Consulting Services, and ineligibles for certain trade agreements.

#### Bidding and Schedule

Bids will be examined based on the following criteria: *_[ISED205192 - NPP.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/18/8eee0f4d90bdac22688e9273cb1f0f51/ised205192_-_npp.pdf)_*
